security: Revealing the official cover backstop and the process for establishing it could expose intelligence personnel and compromise ongoing operations. Quoting directly: "All information concerning this cover arrangement is available in Military Cover, CCG." and "Appropriate action must be taken to ascertain that subject employee is Issued an Army W-2 Form for tax purposes."
summary: This notification confirms the establishment of an official cover backstop for Joseph E. Piccolo on August 15, 1961, utilizing U.S. Army Records Analysis.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET notification, dated 15 August 1961, informs the Chief of MI, attention Mr. Herbert V. Juml, about the establishment of an official cover backstop for Joseph E. Piccolo, referencing Form 1922 dated 28 June 1961. The cover arrangement utilizes U.S. Army Records Analysis, with all related information available in Military Cover, CCG. The memo, signed by C. T. Dollar and Robert E. Young, also requests notification when the cover is no longer required and stipulates that appropriate action be taken to ensure Piccolo receives an Army W-2 form for tax purposes.
title: Notification of Establishment of Official Cover Backstop for Joseph E. Piccolo
